targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", status="200", uri="/topicos"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", status="200", uri="/topicos"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m])
